text: Guido Cerniglia (3 February 1939 - 14 May 2020) was an Italian actor and theatre director. He was born in Palermo, Italy. He was known for his roles in The Scientific Cardplayer (1972), Alla mia cara mamma nel giorno del suo compleanno (1974) and in Il giustiziere di mezzogiorno (1975). Cerniglia died in Rome on 14 May 2020, aged 81.E' morto l'attore palermitano Guido Cerniglia: una vita passata tra teatro, tv e cinema ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian theatre directors
title: Guido Cerniglia
